# HKPrismBase.in

**Case**

The prism base is on the inside edge of the lens.

## Declaration

```swift
case `in`
```

## Discussion

You can only use this value for the prism’s [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKVisionPrism/horizontalBase].

## Prism Base

- **HKPrismBase.none**: No prism correction.
- **HKPrismBase.up**: The prism’s base is at the top of the lens.
- **HKPrismBase.down**: The prism’s base is at the bottom of the lens.
- **HKPrismBase.out**: The prism base is on the outside edge of the lens.
